alert.note: Alert for Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 2:51AM MDT until March 27 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches, highest amounts over King`s Hill Pass. * WHERE...Little Belt and Highwood Mountains. * WHEN...From Noon today to Midnight MDT Sunday Night. * IMPACTS...Travel will difficult at times, especially during the nighttime and morning hours. Those in the backcountry should ensure they have appropriate clothing for the cold and wet conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wet and or slushy roadways will freeze up overnight as snow continues and temperatures fall below freezing, leading to slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
